content.title: Server Information
content.text:
Status: PvPvE - PvP 6Pm to 8PM CST
Offline PvP: Offline Protection Enabled
Difficulty Override: 5.0 - Level 150 Wild Dinos
Item Stack: 2.5X
Supply Crates & Fishing: 1.5X
Baby Maturation & Imprinting: 8X
Egg Hatch Speed: 8X
Mating Interval & Speed: 4X
Harvesting: 4X
Taming: 2X

content.title: Clustered Servers
content.text:
Paragon Gaming - Cluster TI: The Island
Paragon Gaming - Cluster TC: The Center
Paragon Gaming - Cluster SE: Scorched Earth
Paragon Gaming - Cluster AB - Abberation
Paragon Gaming - Cluster EX: Extinction

content.title: RULES
content.text:
Do not block explorer notes
Do not block Obelisk or Artifact Caves
No Griefing, this is a PvPvE server. PvP is enabled 6PM to 8PM CST.
Keep Racism, Politics and Religion out of the game and names.
Check the rules frequently as they may be added to or revised.

content.title: Mods
content.text:
Custom Dion Levels
Adjust the level range of Dino spawns. Currently set to levels 50 to 150.

Super Cryo Storage
Alternative Cryo system, Dino's can produce resources inside the terminal, pick up and imprint babies, incubate eggs and fertilize plots.

Randi's Animal Traps
Craftable traps to simplify trapping and taming.

Awesome Spyglass!
Spyglass shows taming stats as well as taming food.

Crafting Skill Potion
Sets all skill points to crafting for a short amount of time.

 Puller
 Enables you to pull a selected item or materials for a selected engram into an inventory.

Klinger Additional Structures
Early level Dedicated Storage, compact furnace and more.
